content: skills required this pattern is a beginner/ intermediate knitting project size one size fits all approximately 150 cm/ 59 inches long and 28 cm/ 11 inches deep yarn 100g of any fingering 4ply/ sock weight yarn approximately 350 metres/ 383 yards for the main body of the scarf 10g of any fingering 4ply/ sock weight yarn approximately 35 metres/ 38 yards for the tassels the sample in the photo is made with 1 skein of west green loft yarns sock 425 metres/ 465 yards colour lulu needles & notions 3 5 mm us 3 straight or circular needles 1 stitch marker tapestry needle pattern notes pattern is knit flat the size can be easily adjusted by knitting more/ less row different weight yarn and/ or needles can be substituted to achieve different effect and size
